rules_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you control three or more artifacts, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
